name: DarkSnow - My Personal page
body:
## About me
Hi, I'm DarkSnow, and this is my very personnal page !

### My hobbies
Like a lot of people, I like listening to music, or play video games. But I also like programming a lot. (That's why I have a GitHub page, duh.)
My favorites languages are Java and Python, but I also know others languages like C, C++/Qt, and a very little bit of Ruby.
I also use Linux as my main operating system, because yeah, how can you code on an OS like Wandows ? xD

### Social
You can follow me on Twitter (@epicdarksnow) but I don't tweet often, because I have better things to do...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
